name: Undiscovered Country
tagline: How To Get Started Exploring Big Data
body:
Resources and tools used for the Codemotion'13 panel "Undiscovered Country: How To Get Started Exploring Big Data".

### About the Panel.
Big Data is a Big Topic, but if you don’t have a PhD or if you’ve never worked at a supercomputer, how do you get started? During this session four ladies will each present a rapid 10-minute intro with a practical approach for big data beginners. We’ll discuss data visualization, APIs, Hadoop, and open datasets. And we’ll use demos and live coding to dispell some of the mystery of data-crunching vodoo. Don’t think you’re ready? Moderators Johanna Brewer and Amélie Anglade will wrap-up by asking the speakers to share their first-time experiences in this undiscovered country.

[Codemotion Talk Page](http://berlin.codemotionworld.com/talk-page/?talk_name=undiscovered-country-how-to-get-started-exploring-big-data)

Date: May 10, 2013  
Time: 17:00 - 17:40

Location:  
[Hochschule für Technik und Wirtschaft](http://www.htw-berlin.de/)  
Wilhelminenhofstraße 75A  
12459 Berlin  

### About the Panelists.
Irina Ioana Brudaru, Kate McCurdy, and Monika Moser (@momo13).
Bios.

### About the Moderators.
Amélie Anglade (@utstikkar), Johanna Brewer (@deadroxy).
Bois.

### About this Repo.
Information about demos and what it contains.
How to download.

```
$ example commands
```

### Demo Walkthroughs.
Step-by-step installing, sourcing dataset & running demo.

```
$ example commands
```
